Recommendations.Title: Missed bin or recycling collection
Key Strengths: Detailed instructions for reporting a missed bin or recycling collection
Helpful suggestions on how to avoid future misses
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link directly addresses the customer need for council customer information related to missed bin or recycling collections.

Recommendations.Title: Contact us about a waste service
Key Strengths: Information on ordering bins, checking collection days, reporting missed collections, requesting bulky waste collection, and ordering a new garden waste bin or bag
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides comprehensive contact information for various waste services offered by the Bristol council.

Recommendations.Title: Bins and recycling: complaints and feedback
Key Strengths: Provides a platform to make complaints or give feedback about waste services in Bristol
Recommendations.Reasoning: Although not directly about contact information, this link allows customers to provide feedback on the services, which can be valuable.

Recommendations.Title: Order new bins, boxes and lids
Key Strengths: Information about getting replacements for lost or damaged bins, boxes, bags, or lids and instructions on how to cancel an order
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides information about ordering new waste collection equipment.

Recommendations.Title: Guide to the Citizen Portal account
Key Strengths: Information about the Citizen Portal, how to use it for waste forms such as reporting a missed collection, and some street issue reports
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides valuable information about using the Citizen Portal for various waste-related tasks.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: The provided list contains multiple links relevant to council customer information needs related to bins, recycling, and waste services. The top five most relevant links were selected based on their ability to directly address the given search term and provide useful information to customers.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: Although the list contained several relevant links, some had a lower confidence score due to a lesser degree of direct relevance or less comprehensive information.
